scripts.vercel-build: node -e "const cp=require('child_process'); const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const isVercel=!!process.env.VERCEL; const install=isVercel?'ci':'install'; cp.execSync('npm --prefix sveltekit_app ' + install + ' --no-audit --no-fund',{stdio:'inherit'}); cp.execSync('npm --prefix sveltekit_app run build',{stdio:'inherit'}); const src=path.join(process.cwd(),'sveltekit_app','.vercel','output'); const dst=path.join(process.cwd(),'.vercel','output'); fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dst),{recursive:true}); fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true,force:true,dereference:true});"
